title: The Complete Guide to Syncing Your Fitbit with Your iPhone

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . The App Store is the blue icon with the white capital "A".

steps.title: Tap the Search tab.
steps.content: Tap the Search tab. It's located in the lower-right corner. It has a magnifying glass on it.

steps.title: Type Fitbit in the search bar.
steps.content: Type Fitbit in the search bar. It's the grey bar with a magnifying glass. You will see a list of apps that match your search result.

steps.title: Tap GET next to the Fitbit app.
steps.content: Tap GET next to the Fitbit app. Fitbit is the app that has a turquoise icon with dots of varying sizes in the shape of a diamond. This will install the Fitbit app. Type your Apple ID password if prompted. Then tap "Ok".

steps.title: Open the Fitbit app.
steps.content: Open the Fitbit app. It's the app that has a turquoise icon with dots of varying sizes in the shape of a diamond.

steps.title: Tap Join Fitbit.
steps.content: Tap Join Fitbit . It's the large orange button at the bottom of the app. If you already have a Fitbit account, tap "Log in" and sign in with the email address and password associated with your Fitbit account.

steps.title: Select your Fitbit model.
steps.content: Select your Fitbit model. There is a list of Fitbit models with an image of the device. Tap your Fitbit model. Consult your users manual if you are unsure of the model of your Fitbit.

steps.title: Tap Set Up.
steps.content: Tap Set Up . It's at the bottom of the screen that has an image of your Fitbit model.

steps.title: Type your name, email address, and a password.
steps.content: Type your name, email address, and a password. Type your full name in the first box, your email address in the second box, and create a password in the third box.

steps.title: Tap next to Terms of Service and Privacy policy.
steps.content: Tap next to Terms of Service and Privacy policy. This indicates that you agree to the terms of service and privacy policy and tab the next button.

steps.title: Tap Let's Go.
steps.content: Tap Let's Go . Now you will be asked to provide some personal information.

steps.title: Set your height and tap Next.
steps.content: Set your height and tap Next . Swipe up and down to set your height. Tap "Next" when you are done.

steps.title: Select your gender and tap Next.
steps.content: Select your gender and tap Next . Tap the male silhouette, or the female silhouette with a dress to select your gender. Then tap "Next".

steps.title: Set your weight and tap Next.
steps.content: Set your weight and tap Next . Swipe left and right to set your weight. Tap "Next" when you are done.

steps.title: Set your birthday and tap Next.
steps.content: Set your birthday and tap Next . Swipe left and right to set the day, month and year of your birthday.

steps.title: Tap Next when you are done.
steps.content: Tap Next when you are done. This will set up your Fitbit account. From now on, you can log in with your email address and password.

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . It's the app with two gears.

steps.title: Tap Bluetooth.
steps.content: Tap Bluetooth . It's the fourth option from the top of the settings menu.

steps.title: Tap across from Bluetooth.
steps.content: Tap across from Bluetooth. If the switch icon across from "Bluetooth" is green, bluetooth is on.

steps.title: Place Fitbit device near iPhone.
steps.content: Place Fitbit device near iPhone. Your Fitbit will need to be in range of your iPhone's Bluetooth.

steps.title: Open the Fitbit app.
steps.content: Open the Fitbit app. It's is the app that has a turquoise icon with dots of varying sizes in the shape of a diamond.

steps.title: Tap the Fitbit button.
steps.content: Tap the Fitbit button. It's the button that has an image of the Fitbit device in the upper-left corner.

steps.title: Tap Sync Now.
steps.content: Tap Sync Now . It's the second to last option at the bottom of the Fitbit menu. Tap the switch across from "All-Day Sync" to sync automatically throughout the day.
